text: Xylotrechis aedon is a species of longhorn beetles of the family Cerambycidae.Xylotrechus aedon Jordan, 1903, biolib.cz The species was described in 1903 by Karl Jordan. This species is endemic to São Tomé and Príncipe, where it occurs on the island of São Tomé.Tavakilian G. & Chevillotte H. (2018). Base de données Titan sur les Cerambycidés ou Longicornes. Xylotrechus aedon. Accessed: 20 January 2019 Its length is 11 mm. ==References== Category:Cerambycidae Category:Beetles of Africa Category:Beetles described in 1903 Category:Invertebrates of São Tomé and Príncipe Category:Endemic fauna of São Tomé Island
title: Xylotrechus aedon
